name: Mystery House
description:
Mystery House is a side-scrolling, point-and-click adventure Similar to games like Flashback or Snatcher. Players move through hallways, occasionally fighting enemies and examining rooms.

Controls

ARROW KEYS move the character or the cursor

C is the general purpose action key. Use it to select menu items, enter rooms, investigate objects, and move between floors.

Z is used to draw your weapon. A change in music alerts you if enemies are on the floor.

X fires your weapon

------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for the Haunted House Game Jam
